Class ImageQuizService

java.lang.Object
com.quizapp.quiz.backend.service.ImageQuizService
public class ImageQuizService extends Object
Service class for the "Image Quiz" game mode (Guess the Game from an image).

Handles data retrieval for games, searching, and complex comparison logic used to provide feedback on the user's guess (like Wordle/connections style).

Author:
machm

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ImageQuizService.ComparisonResponse
    Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to convey the results of a comparison (e.g., in a guessing game where a user's guess is validated against a target).

  • Method Details

    • getRandomGame

      public Game getRandomGame()
      Retrieves a single random game from the database that has a background image available.
      Returns:
      A Game object with full details, or null if no suitable game is found.

    • getAllGamesList

      public List<Game> getAllGamesList()
      Retrieves a list of all games that have an available background image, sorted by title.
      Returns:
      A list of Game objects.

    • searchGamesByTitle

      public List<String> searchGamesByTitle(String q)
      Searches for games whose titles match the given query (case-insensitive, partial match). Used typically for autocompletion on the frontend.
      Parameters:
      q - The search query string.
      Returns:
      A list of matching game titles (up to 20 results).

    • getGameByTitle

      public Game getGameByTitle(String title)
      Retrieves a single game by its exact title.
      Parameters:
      title - The exact title of the game.
      Returns:
      The Game object, or null if not found.

    • getGameById

      public Game getGameById(int id)
      Retrieves a single game by its internal ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The internal ID of the game.
      Returns:
      The Game object, or null if not found.

    • compareGames

      public ImageQuizService.ComparisonResponse compareGames(String guessTitle, String correctTitle)
      Compares the user's guessed game with the correct game, providing status codes for various attributes.

      Logic includes: title matching (exact, partial), genre/platform intersection, and numerical rating/year difference.

      Parameters:
      guessTitle - The title guessed by the user.
      correctTitle - The title of the correct game.
      Returns:
      A ImageQuizService.ComparisonResponse detailing the match status for each field.
